actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to award grants to eligible entities to implement and evaluate demonstrations of models and best practices in nursing care and to develop innovative strategies for retention of professional nurses.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to award grants to eligible entities to carry out and evaluate demonstrations of models and best practices in nursing care and to develop innovative strategies or approaches for retention of professional nurses.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to award grants to eligible entities to implement and evaluate demonstrations of models and best practices in nursing care and to develop innovative strategies for retention of professional nurses.
